Bollywood Pays Tribute To Kader Khan, Sonali Bendre Is Back In Town & More From Ent.
From updating fans about Kader Khan's health to confirming the news of his death, Amitabh Bachchan has come across as a concerned friend. Veteran Bollywood actor-writer Kader Khan passed away on December 31 after a prolonged illness.
Kader Khan was performing in a college play when Dilip Kumar saw him and offered and signed him for next film.
Taking to Twitter, Aamir Khan shares his list of resolutions and it's practically a win win for all the Aamir fans. Infact, the first one is something we should all inspire to be too.
According to reports, Kader Khan reported the issue of breathlessness, after which the doctors reportedly transferred him from a regular ventilator to BiPAP ventilator. Khan's contribution to Hindi cinema also includes his writing for 250 movies.

After a really tough 2018, Sonali Bendre and husband Goldie Bahl are entering this new year with a hopeful heart. Sonali is in Mumbai for her small 'happy interval' from her treatment for high grade cancer.
